tool_description: Generates reusable content templates for different types of volunteer opportunities to streamline future listing creation.

include_examples.description: Whether to include example content in template fields

custom_fields.description: Additional custom fields to include in template

error_messages: Invalid template name: Template name cannot be empty and must be unique.
Unsupported category: The opportunity_category is not recognized. Use standard volunteer categories.
Invalid template type: Use 'basic', 'detailed', or 'comprehensive' for template_type.
Invalid organization type: Use 'nonprofit', 'school', 'hospital', or 'community-group' for organization_type.
Template creation failed: Unable to generate template due to invalid configuration.
Duplicate template name: A template with this name already exists.
usage: Provide template_name, opportunity_category, and template_type to generate a reusable template. Customize with organization_type and custom_fields as needed.

template_id.description: Unique identifier for the created template

template_structure.description: JSON structure of the template with field definitions

field_count.description: Number of fields included in the template
